title: Zoorg

content: Hey guys,I recently found my old PC where I had installed Multibit v0.4.1And I wanted to try to transfer the content, (if there is any,, dont remenber), to another wallet.Anyway, I fired it up and cant login, but I have my old seed.So I choosed the option to "restore from wallet words"Well, that seems not to work eather, when I added the last word, the NEXT >> is still greyed out.I dont remember Â "What created this wallet words" eather, but it doesnt matter, the button is greyed out eather way.I have a backup folder, but how to connect it?Didnt get that question.EDIIT:I managed to do it:)I restored it.Now its Synconizing...How long can that take?Looks like its many blocks to syncronize.About 350000Edit2:It started to Restore, but seems stuck now o 278000What can be the reason?
